titleStmt.title: A brief account of the rebellions and bloudshed occasioned by the anti-Christian practices of the Jesuits and other popish emissaries in the empire of Ethiopia collected out of a manuscript history written in Latin by Jo. Michael Wansleben, a learned papist.
titleStmt.author: Wansleben, Johann Michael, 1635-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Jonathan Edwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
